abstract: Bill Hughes, the head of Barclays loans syndicate in the United States, will work at a similar position, according to an internal memorandum that was obtained by DealBook.
snippet: Bill Hughes, the head of Barclays loans syndicate in the United States, will work at a similar position, according to an internal memorandum that was obtained by DealBook.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup has hired Barclays Capital‘s head of United States loans syndicate to work at a similar position, the firm said in an internal memorandum to employees on Monday that was obtained by DealBook.

headline.main: Citi Hires Senior Barclays Capital Executive
